listing.listing_description:
Steal away to a haven where the traditional and contemporary are perfectly paired, and a charming rural setting is nevertheless close to beaches, nightlife and the airport, at Finca Bonito. Though it’s set amid a lush garden outside San Lorenzo, this lovingly restored heritage property is only 15 minutes from the sights, restaurants and nightlife of Ibiza Town. Reserve this four-bedroom vacation rental for a quiet holiday with family or a sunny getaway with friends.

A lot that’s nearly an acre and a half in size and beautifully landscaped with mature plantings ensures a serene, private backdrop for your stay. The grounds include a pool, an expansive terrace with lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and an open-sided Balinese-style pavilion. Other amenities range from a satellite TV and sound system to Wi-Fi.

The 200-year-old residence was recently restored to a state of modern luxury, and now boasts contemporary comforts such as air conditioning and underfloor heating. But the tile-roofed, stucco-clad house is still replete with antique charm, from the carved panels and cozy fireplace in the two living rooms and dining areas to the beamed ceiling in the sleek, fully equipped kitchen.

Finca Bonito has three bedrooms with king beds and terrace access, and one bedroom with two twin beds; all four have en-suite bathrooms. Clean-lined furnishings and artwork sourced from around the globe give the bedrooms a stylish yet eclectic appeal.

When you arrive on Ibiza, it’s only a 25-minute drive from the airport to the villa’s location between Santa Gertrudis and San Lorenzo. Find the perfect gift (or a treat for yourself) or enjoy a honeymoon-worthy dinner at one of the popular shops and restaurants nearby. For a day of sightseeing or an unforgettable evening out, make the 15-minute drive into Ibiza Town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual vanity, Air conditioning, Access to terrace

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular villa is situated in the Greve in Chianti area of Tuscany, a short walk from the village of Panzano. Part of the Villa Le Marcelina hamlet (comprising three secluded homes), the villa enjoys its own expansive estate with a lovely alfresco dining terrace and private infinity swimming pool. The superbly remodeled house maintains much of the antique charm of its sixteenth-century origins, with beautiful stone facades and a colombaia (turret) with 360-degree views of the countryside. Contemporary amenities and décor include a gourmet kitchen, indoor plunge pool, and superb contemporary artwork with women-centered themes (hence the “Donne” of the villa’s name). Seven queen bedrooms with ensuite or private bathrooms (including a stunning master suite with in-room jetted tub) accommodate up to fourteen guests.

Nestled amid flowering gardens and surrounded by some of the region's finest vineyards, the estate offers an exceptional venue for special occasions or serene escapes. The upper plateau features an eight-by-eight-meter swimming pool and plentiful sun loungers, with spectacular views of the valley and hills. On the lower level, an outdoor kitchen and canopied dining area inspire memorable meals in the cypress-scented air.

The owners’ artful remodeling project has breathed a contemporary spirit into the vintage Tuscan home. The main salon features a wood-burning hearth and sloping ceilings of rustic wood and brick. Gorgeous archways lead into a second sitting area and a luminous breakfast room. The main dining room with farmhouse table is perfect for nighttime feasts with family and friends. Gourmet travelers will adore the fully equipped kitchen, which includes a seven-burner cooker, double oven, and French doors to the patio. Upstairs, the spa-style plunge pool gazes out on the landscape through a picture window.

All seven suites feature queen beds and ensuite or private bathrooms. In the master suite, an elevated jetted tub is perched beside a high-end TV. There is a second jetted tub in one of the guest bathrooms. Air conditioning throughout the villa ensures comfort in all seasons.

Ville Delle Donna is about twenty miles from both Florence and Siena, and a short car trip from several fabulous villages, including Monteriggioni, San Gimignano, and Castellina. Golfers are an easy drive from Ugolino Golf Club and Dante Alighieri Golf e Country Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on a west-facing hillside just outside of Sant Antoni de Portmany and Ibiza Town, Can Juana is a luxuriously appointed vacation home that was designed to capture incredible sunsets and countryside views. With privacy provided by lush greenery, this breezy six-bedroom is the perfect host for a family vacation or an exciting getaway with a group of friends. There are several pristine beachfront areas just minutes from Can Juana, as well as the village of San Jose, where you'll find boutique shops, cafes, markets, and authentic Spanish cuisine.

Designed to embrace the natural environment, Can Juana has incorporated wood, stone, and local flora into its open-concept interior. With large openings to the terrace, the free-flowing atmosphere is felt throughout the entire indoor space. Designer furniture, high tech electronics, and eclectic works of art decorate the calming interior, creating a relaxing, yet elegant space to enjoy an amazing vacation.

At dinner, you'll love the formal dining area inside, but if you can't tear yourself away from the beautiful weather, there's an alfresco set on the terrace. Also on the terrace, there's a beautiful swimming pool with sun loungers and outdoor living areas spread throughout the sunny space. In the main house, there are four king en-suite bedrooms, and two more bedrooms in the guest suite, which features a separate entrance and a kitchenette.

Well known as the nightlife capital of the world, the Island of Ibiza is infamous for its beachfront bars, dance clubs, and exciting year-round festivities. Sant Antoni and Ibiza Town are the two main cities on the island. There's some debate over which is the more famous party destination. With both being around fifteen-kilometers from Can Juana, you'll be in the perfect position to decide for yourself. If you feel like something a little more low-key, head for Old Town Ibiza where you can enjoy breathtaking architecture, art galleries, cafes, and fine dining.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated near the town of Agrigento in southwestern Sicily, just minutes from the beach and world-renowned Greek ruins, the seven-bedroom Villa Agora provides a spectacular sanctuary for families and destination wedding guests seeking privacy and unparalleled Sicilian enchantment

Surrounded by lush and verdant hillsides, the villa's outdoor spaces offer myriad opportunities for relaxation and play. Take a swim in the gorgeous swimming pool around the palm tree island, or bathe in the spectacular, lagoon-like hot tub amid massive stones and dreamy cypresses. Savor the Mediterranean sun on elegant loungers, and sip your morning espresso on poolside tables. In the afternoon, enjoy a game on the football (soccer) pitch, before relishing a meal at the alfresco table, prepared at the outdoor kitchen with barbeque grill. In the evening, sip a fine Italian wine on the veranda as the light fades over the hills.

The villa's Main House includes an exquisite living lounge with sumptuous leather sofa and flat-screen television, and an adjoining open-plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen, a dining table for six, and a comfortable lounge. High ceilings of exposed wood and floors of smooth stone tile echo the villa's bucolic setting, while the furnishings and décor offer exquisite, contemporary style. The Main House bedrooms include the master suite, with king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted tub, and two guest rooms—on with double bed, one with twin—with ensuite bathrooms.

The Annex features an outstanding spa on the ground floor, with Turkish bath, hot tub, and fitness room, as well as a kitchen and living room on the first floor. The first floor has three bedrooms, including one with ensuite bathroom and two that share a bathroom between them. The ground-floor bedroom has a double bed and ensuite bathroom. There is also an excellent game room.

Villa Agora is wonderfully situated for enjoying one of the most beautiful areas Sicily, and indeed all of Italy. Agrigento and the nearby Valley of the Temples—designated a World Heritage Site for the splendor of its Greek Ruins—are just minutes away. San Leone Beach is only ten kilometers (about six miles) from your door and the white cliffs of the Scala dei Turchi are also nearby.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Capture panoramic city and mountain views from the sunny balcony of this penthouse-ski-lodge in the heart of Zermatt. Warm yourself by the fireplace after a day on the slopes or enjoy the outdoors a little longer and rejuvenate in the hot tub. When you’re ready to hit the town, head down to the streets below and find Michelin-starred restaurants, old-school cocktail bars, and boutique shops.

From peaked-ceiling to the warm wood floor, Tschugge mixes modern decor with traditional ski lodge vibes. The open concept layout makes it easy to maintain a social atmosphere even when in separate areas. On nights in, show off your culinary skills in the fully equipped kitchen. After, unleash your inner mixologist and settle into the lounge area by the mountain-view-framing balcony windows.

In the warmer months, the rooftop garden is the perfect spot to get some reading done over your morning Nespresso. At night, watch the stars while you warm up around the fire pit. And, the hot tub is a welcoming space any time of the year. On quieter nights, stretch out on the plush sofa in the television lounge and watch a movie with the kids or take a cup of hot chocolate out to the balcony and enjoy the view.

Carve up the fresh powder each morning after walking 4 minutes to the Sunnega Express Ski Lift. If you need some inspiration before hitting the slopes, walk 5 minutes to the Matterhorn Museum. When you’re not skiing, enjoy the rugged landscape on the mountain biking trails through the foothills, plan a rock climbing excursion, or charter a fishing trip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Old world charm meets modern style at this Italian luxury villa. Located in the historic Modica region of Southern Sicily, part of UNESCO’s Heritage Site’s, this private vacation rental resides among some of the most amazing landscapes and architecture the world has even known. Some of the many sites in Modica include, the Cathedral of San Giorgio, Church of San Pietro, and the Castle of the Counts of Modica. You will definitely want to bring a camera.

Ancient building materials, stone and wood, are the ingredients of this villa’s original design. Formerly a barn complex, now a luxurious modern home, Casi O Cantu has taken the most time tested elements from the old world and added in state of the art building materials to create an updated homage to the regions rich architectural history. Stone walls and archways and exposed wood vaulted ceilings can be seen in most areas of the interior. They are complimented by wooden furniture, cozy seating, and an open concept design, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Through an amazing stone archway, you’ll find the immaculate kitchen. Stocked with top of the line stainless steel appliances, marble countertops, and a rustic sleek decor, you’ll feel like you’ve gone back in time, but you’ve brought a chef’s kitchen with you.

Outside on the terrace, enjoy an afternoon dip in the refreshing salt water pool. For lunch, prepare a meal in the outdoor kitchen, or on the barbecue, and eat in the alfresco dining area. For dinner, head inside to the formal dining area and light a fire in the beautiful stone fireplace. Then turn on the sound system, and the tone is set for an elegant evening.

After you’ve taken the time to explore Modica, direct your attention onwards to the amazing historic regions of Ragusa, Siracusa, and Mount Etna, all fellow members of UNESCO, they are a must-see if you’re a history aficionado. Or, if you’re feeling like a trip to the beach, there are several public beaches just a short drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Formerly a schoolhouse, this minimalistic villa is where you’ll delightfully disconnect while basking in the warm afternoon sun and fragrant Tuscan greenery.  Mature Cypresses, Pines, and Cedars create a secluded atmosphere, perfect for sunbathing, alfresco dinners, and private parties. Rejuvenate in the thermal spas of San Casciano Dei Bagni before heading to explore the cobblestone streets of Cetona. 

Light the lanterns that surround the swimming pool, outdoor lounge, and alfresco dining area to set the tone for a fun night in with friends. Rather a quiet evening? Get a fire going inside, find a good movie on satellite television, and let the countryside breeze wash over you as you curl up under a blanket on the sofa. Then, retreat to master bedroom’s 4-post bed or relax in the ensuite’s stone bathtub.

Stretch out on a poolside sun lounger while the kids play soccer on the lawn, maybe pop in for a lap or two if you’re keeping up with your fitness routine. Then, book yourself a massage or in-house spa service. Keep the relaxation going and skip dinner prep; there are a bunch of great add-ons available, including chef services, grocery delivery, and more.

Start your day in Cetona with a coffee at one of the cafes lining Piazza Garibaldi, the 16th-century town square. From there, follow ancient streets to discover inspiring architecture and authentic Sienese and Tuscan restaurants. Mount Cetona is home to 3 historical museums, covering the Paleolithic to the Bronze Age. Rome, Siena, and Florence are all drivable within an hour or 2. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: 4 minute walk to San Casciano dei Bagni
143 km to Florence and Peretola Airport (FLR)

feature.p: Take a visit to the reknowned thermal spa in San Casciano dei Bagni. It was the Etruscans who first discovered the healing properties of the thermal waters in Val d'Orcia. In the 17th century, the renowned Medici family built a series of baths, which have been reborn as a luxurious new spa featured in Travel & Leisure.

The enchanting town of Cetona will charm you with its cobblestone streets and medieval architecture. This lovely village has grown in popularity as a home for international artists and socialites. Stop for an exquisite lunch or dinner at Osteria Vecchia (so good!)—you won't be disappointed.
Definitely worth a visit are Orvieto, Assisi and Todi. Head to Deruta to shop for the renowned local ceramics. Last but not least, make sure to check out the chocolate museum in Perugia!

listing.listing_address: San Casciano dei Bagni, Siena, Italy

listing.listing_description:
Touch Tuscany’s traditional country life with this beautifully restored farmhouse dating from the early 16th century. Retaining the same centuries-old exterior, the villa now has complete modern decor, AC and all mod cons. A sloped garden leads to a pool and garden tower, offering 360 degree views. Majestic ruins, impressive castles and charming hilltop restaurants abound within a short drive.  

Guests will arrive at Podere Capannelle via the Val d'Orcia, a region of naturally-sculpted ridges and tranquil hillsides that have been protected as a UNESCO World Heritage site. Entering the huge, sunlit driveway, the light-coloured stone and blue shutters of the farmhouse offer a vision of old-school charm. Ascend the exterior staircase to enter thoughtfully outfitted rooms, which are furnished with nod after nod to Italian styling, from the luscious leather furniture, to the craftsman-worked wooden tables and fittings, to the rich marble utilized in the home’s numerous and stylish ensuite bathrooms. Take in serene views of the quiet countryside from the beautifully-maintained garden that surrounds the home, stroll the expansive lawns and pathways adjacent to the house, or lounge in the poolside sun-recliners or covered dining area.

Podere Capannelle is ideally positioned for those looking to enjoy the riches and unique atmosphere of the Tuscan countryside. From the towering Fortezza di Radicofani that dominates the nearby village, to the quiet lanes, secluded village squares and old-world cafes that dot the nearby communes, guests can take to the roads by bike or car and fall under the ancient spell of this part of Italy. With good proximity to the Riserva Naturale Monte Rufeno, guests can visit the largest natural parc in Umbria, complete with stunning mountain views and towering waterfalls. Return after each day trip to a flavoursome glass of local chianti on the sunset terrace, as the light turns golden on the nearby hills.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated on one of the city’s most beautiful streets, in one of the world’s most beautiful cities, this two-bedroom apartment enjoys an extremely prestigious and convenient location in bustling downtown London, England. From your rooftop terrace, you’ll have an incredible view of St. James Palace, and Historic St. James Street, which is famous for its stately architecture, boutique shops, and fine dining establishments. Perfect for a family vacation, honeymoon, or business trip, Palace View Penthouse celebrates London in style.

Just like St. James Street below, this penthouse is adorned with classic and sophisticated finishes. Hardwood flooring, designer furniture, and high-end electronics fill the Palace View Penthouse interior. If a wall isn’t displaying an eclectic work of art, it must be because it is showing off, yet another, scenic view of the historic street and palace just outside. On the balcony, you’ll find a delightful little alfresco set, the perfect spot to enjoy your morning tea before another exciting day in London.

Palace View Penthouse features a fully equipped kitchen, decorated with state of the art appliances and sleek cabinetry. There’s a formal dining area, perfect for hosting friends and colleagues, with seating for eight. And, both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms; the master features a sitting area with a scenic view of St. James Street.

London is a great walking city, especially in this bustling area, so forget about guidebooks, the city will show you around. Within a two-mile radius, you’ll find Piccadilly Circus, Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Hyde Park, Westminster Abbey, and the London Eye. You’ll have no trouble finding shopping, dining, and nightlife options in central London, and the bars and pubs are the finest on the planet. If you’re feeling like cooking at home or you’d like to sample a wide variety of high-end street foods, Borough Market is always a great spot to enjoy vibrant atmosphere and finely crafted foods.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you appreciate fine dining, fine art, and fine wine, love historic architecture and wish to lead an undemanding, yet elegant lifestyle, there is no better place for you to be than Italy’s Puglia region. The vineyards, olive groves, and ancient towns are rich with old-world authenticity, as is Villa Petrose, your next Luxury Retreats vacation home. With an abundance of indoor/outdoor space and accommodations for thirteen, Petrose is perfect for a family getaway or a special event like a romantic destination wedding.

Merging classic Mediterranean architecture with a modern-contemporary philosophy led to Villa Petrose restructuring. Once a typical rural eighteenth-century building, this property has been carefully restored and outfitted using local materials and techniques. The interior features lots of floor-to-ceiling glass openings and white exposed wood ceiling beams, ensuring the flow of fresh country-side breeze and bright, natural sunlight. Designer furniture, neutral colors, and raw natural accent pieces are the highlights of the interior decor. The kitchen is fully equipped with state of the art appliances and plenty of functional counter space.

Villa Petrose does an outstanding job of combining its relaxing, old-world elements with its modern high-tech gadgets. Television, a house laptop, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and an exercise room are all ready to use when you’re not enjoying the swimming pool, jetted tub, lounge chairs and hammocks outside. The bedrooms at Petrose are divided between the main house, with three queen-en-suites, and the guest house with two queen/single bedrooms, both with en-suites as well.

Within six kilometers of Petrose, you’ll be able to find shops, banks, restaurants, and markets. There’s tennis, horseback riding, and diving classes on Campo Marino’s sandy beachfront. There are also several vineyards in the area that offer wine tasting and tours. Drive a little further, and you could spend an afternoon visiting the “Florence of the South” Lecce. There, you’ll find amazing historical sites like the Cattedrale di Lecce, Basilica di Santa Croce, and the Roman Amphitheatre.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tap into the vibrant scene of the Algarve at Villa Hibiscus Beach House. Set along the golden stretch of the Praia de Galé beach, this property is one of the few vacation rentals in the area to offer the luxury of an oceanfront location. Reserve its four bedrooms and chic, colorful interiors for a sunny stay with friends or a relaxed holiday with up to eight of your closest family.

Watch the waves from a private terrace with a heated pool, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining area. In the evenings, relax in front of the fireplace or TV, or catch up with friends at home via Wi-Fi. The villa is also air conditioned and has laundry facilities for your convenience.

Pieces from around the globe give the villa’s interiors eclectic appeal. The open-concept living and dining room features everything from breezy wicker seating and batik prints to hand-carved Buddhas. The separate kitchen is fully equipped and has a stylish breakfast table painted in bright turquoise for an extra morning pick-me-up.

Villa Hibiscus Beach House has four bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms and TVs, including a master suite that opens directly to the pool area. For larger parties or families traveling with children, there’s a fifth bedroom with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms are decorated in a bold, brilliant mix of colors and patterns.

From the villa’s location in central Algarve, it’s a short drive to several beaches—and a short walk to the honeymoon-worthy one just in front. Find local shops, restaurants, bars and more in downtown Albufeira and Guia, or take a quiet stroll or bike ride through the nearby Salgado nature reserve. History buffs will want to take a day trip to Silves Castle.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Catalina is an exquisitely renovated villa set in rural Sitges, Barcelona. It is set within 400 acres of private secluded grounds offering spectacular views of the Penedés Wine region.

This spacious and beautifully established terracotta colored villa features restful living areas, traditional shuttered windows and tiled flooring. It’s relaxed rustic outward appearance contrasts with its luxurious indoor spaces. The villa is well equipped to handle large groups and has ample spaces for your party to spread out. There is a spacious fully equipped kitchen and handsome dining area for up to 30.  Should you wish to relax inside there’s a satellite TV, DVD player, CD and Wi-Fi and fitness room. Why not challenge someone to a game of table tennis or football or try out the video gaming?

Your extensive outside facilities include private swimming pool, a large patio and lounging area, al fresco dining area with seating for 18 and al fresco boardroom. There is also a barbeque with children’s play area.  The property also features a unique traditional Catalan stone shepherd's hut. Villa Catalina is an ideal venue for a wedding or a corporate event. It features a gorgeous Bodega that sits 150 people. The garden and pool area can also accommodate a large group of up to 300. At additional cost and with advance notice staffing and catering can be provided.

Villa Catalina can accommodate up to 30 guests overnight in its 15 gorgeous bedrooms, nine include en-suite facilities.  All bedrooms include air conditioning and heating for the colder months.

Penedes is a natural and historical region of the autonomous community of Catalonia and is located in the south of the Principality of Catalonia between the pre-coastal mountain range, the Serralada Pre-litoral and the Mediterranean. This wine-producing region is framed by the coastal hills of the Serra del Garraf and the higher inland mountains, which skirt the Catalan Central Depression. It is considered to be one of the country’s best wine-producing regions, better known for its Cava production, a sparking wine, although the region also produces some highly regarded, oak-aged reds.

It is 4 km to Sitges Golf Course and 8 km to tennis court at Centre Esportiu Vallpineda. 12 km to Club de Golf Terramar and 20 km to Barcelona Ferry Port

And 46 km drive to Barcelona. La Molina ski slopes are 80 km away. It is 8 km to Sitges Beach and 10 km to San Sebastian Beach. The Barcelona–El Prat Airport (BCN) is 30 km.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/villa-catalina-villa-in-sitges/)

Permit: HUTB-012348

listing.listing_description:
Rising out a verdant Tuscan valley, this delightful and historic castle is set in the idyllic green surroundings of the Val d'Orcia. Fully renovated, the exterior stone turns golden at sunset, with guests free to enjoy the grand rooms, gardens, vineyard, courtyard and poolside lawns. A profusion of charming villages, vineyards and nature reserves are just minutes away, with majestic Siena nearby.  

Visible from kilometres away, the heights of Castelnuovo Tancredi announce themselves upon the guest from a distance. Entering the welcoming and Italian-tiled foyer, guests will experience a perfect night’s sleep in the huge bedrooms that feature vaulted ceilings and canopy beds. When morning dawns, guests can take in the stunning, rolling hillsides of the protected valley from the villa’s open-air terrace, before exploring the rambling, beautifully maintained gardens, the blue pearl that is the villa’s pool, or the perfectly-maintained tennis court. The stone, ivy-lined walls of the impressive inner courtyard make for a perfect oasis of peace, with the afternoon warmth emanating around the shaded alfresco table. 

This villa is surrounded by a wealth of day-trip options. Guests can taste the riches of the vineyard and visit the impressive wine cellars that buttress the castle, or venture a few minutes away to the charming medieval streets of the village of Buonconvento. To the east, the forest paths and impressive viewpoints of two nature reserves make for excellent hiking and family outing options. The Renaissance-splendor of Siena is on full display less than 30 minutes to the north, with the town’s stunning central square and UNESCO-protected architecture providing a jaw-dropping example of Italy’s rich history. After a day spent exploring the riches of the countryside, return to the huge interior dining space of the castle to savor a hearty Italian meal, before taking a rich glass of Sangiovese on the moonlit terrace.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Jardin (“Garden House”) is situated in the countryside near Ibiza Town, minutes from Playa d'en Bossa. The estate is brimming with lush, beautifully landscaped gardens and orchards that create an ambiance of vibrant serenity. Ideal for special occasions or relaxing escapes, the expansive grounds feature a large swimming pool, a well-equipped outdoor kitchen, an ample lawn, and a wraparound terrace with panoramic views of the coastline and sea. The villa's six superb bedroom suites are distributed throughout the main house, gardens, and courtyard, offering well-appointed privacy for up to twelve guests.

The villa blends gracefully into the natural surroundings, with beautiful stone walls evoking the island's rustic character, and lovely vines gracing the open-air patios. Step into the voluminous swimming pool for a soothing soak, and bask in the sunlight on stylish lounge chairs. Prepare delicious meals in the outdoor kitchen, and relish them alfresco at the sea-view table. Sip drinks in the shaded lounges on the patio, and linger outdoors deep into the evening, admiring starry sky over the Mediterranean.

A vanishing wall joins the patio with the interior, inviting the sea-scented air into the home. On cooler nights, close the doors and kindle the fireplace as you uncork a bottle of Spanish wine. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped and features sleek surfaces, chef-grade appliances, and a breakfast bar. Air conditioning and a security system keep you comfortable at all times.

The villa features two suites with king beds, three with queen beds, and one with two twin-size beds. All enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master suite has a private terrace, walk-in closet, and dressing area, and its bathroom boasts a dual vanity, top-of-the-line shower, and lovely soaking tub. The arrangement of the suites offers a comfortable haven for families or destination wedding guests.

Casa Jardin balances seclusion and convenience on this unique island, as renowned for its beauty as for its incomparable nightlife. You're just eight kilometers from Ibiza Town and Sant Josep de sa Talaia, and within easy reach of the beaches at Talamanca and Playa d'en Bossa. The international airport is just four kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning luxury apartment is located at the very heart of historic Rome, with expansive views of the Barcaccia Fountain and the Spanish Steps from its ample dining room and balcony. Part of the Spagna Royal Suite Hotel, the residence is exquisitely furnished and offers ample private space for savoring privacy with loved-ones, while the prime location in Campo Marzio places you within steps of Via Condotti and myriad Roman attractions.Three king bedroom suites and total accommodations for six upto 12 adults make The Club at the Spanish Steps a fabulous choice for families and multiple couples.

The centerpiece of the home is its extraordinary dining room. French bay windows open to a balcony with breathtaking views of the Piazza di Spagna, while its circular table seats eight on velvet chairs. A palette of mauve, violet, and burnt teal complements chevron parquet floors, illuminated by copious natural light and a beautiful chandelier. Beyond the dining room, multiple lounge areas invite you to savor digestivi at night or a morning espresso before the day's foray on the city. The kitchen is fully equipped, and there is a conference room for business travelers.

Each bedroom suite is like a luxury apartment unto itself, with a king bed, minibar, espresso machine, safe, TV, and ensuite bathroom. One of the bathrooms has dual showers, while the other two have one shower each. There are also two sofa beds in the living room that can accommodate children or extra guests. Air conditioning and heating ensure comfort in all seasons.

There is hardly a finer location from which to experience the ancient spirit and vibrant contemporary scene of the Eternal City. You're directly across from the Spanish Steps and the Keats-Shelley Memorial House, and a few paces from the famed designer boutiques of Via Condotti. Enjoy an easy stroll to the Trevi Fountain, and continue to Piazza del Popolo or the world-renowned art collection of the Villa Borghese. Countless iconic destinations are within five to fifteen minutes by car, and the city's two major airports are both within a half-hour of your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
See the ancient beauty of Sicily in an ultra-modern light at Blumarine. With large terraces, spacious grounds and streamlined architecture, this private five-bedroom oceanfront villa is a contemporary oasis on the coast. Its location within walking distance of the beach in the Siracusa area makes it an ideal base for exploring the region’s historic towns.

Blumarine opens to a broad lawn and extensive deck with a shaded sitting area, a row of lounge chairs in the sun and an inviting pool. Whether you’ve been for a swim in the pool or the sea, rinse off in the al-fresco shower before stepping into the outdoor kitchen and grilling local seafood on the barbecue. The flavors will only be enhanced by the views from the outdoor dining area. Choose a bottle from the wine cellar and spend the evening watching television or indulging in a session in the sauna or hot tub.

The refined interiors of this vacation rental combine beachy comfort with modern luxury. Pale wood floors and white walls are a gallery-like backdrop for pieces like a crisp white sectional, farmhouse-style dining table and chairs and deep blue artwork in the open-plan living and dining room. The adjacent fully equipped eat-in kitchen has its own views of the sea and a dreamy wallpaper that recalls antique painted maps.

Five suite-style bedrooms mean Blumarine can accommodate family vacations or intimate honeymoons with ease. There are three bedrooms with double beds, two of which have private balconies, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. The same light floors and walls as in the main living areas give the bedrooms the same quietly stylish feel, while wallpaper in a bird motif adds a hint of whimsy and color.

Start your holiday on Sicily with a flight into Comiso Airport, 57 km from the villa, or Catania Fontanarossa Airport, 121 km away. Once you’re at Blumarine, you’re just a 1-minute walk from Rocky Beach and a 10-minute walk from Sandy Beach. Find amenities like shopping and dining in the nearby town of Pozzallo, 8.5 km away, and plan a day trip to the historic towns of Modica and Ragusa. If it’s just not a vacation without golf, make the 40 km drive to Donnafugata Golf Course for a round or two.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the Sonalon area and nestled in the heights of Verbier, Chalet Alpin Roc’s elevated position provides breathtaking views of the surrounding mountain peaks and the village below. Just a seven minute drive from the village center and a jaunt to the golf club, enjoy the splendor of a chalet where the shiny green pines meet the chill of white snow. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!

Chalet Alpin Roc makes a great beat for any season. Lounge with your favorite tipple in front of a roaring fire or watch the sun set over the mountains while sitting in the soothing bubbles of the outdoor hot tub. Interior perks include a media loft, Wi-Fi and a hammam steam room. A large mezzanine area above the main living area has been set aside as a chill out space and television room with low comfortable sofas. Wi-Fi and a mud room with boot heaters are provided for your convenience. Your reservation includes housekeeping and lift pass delivery service.

The wonderfully bright open plan living and dining area is the height of alpine chic. Old wood and natural stones have been successfully combined with contemporary Italian furnishings and Swiss detailing. The modern open plan kitchen is well equipped to cater for a sophisticated soirée or a light lunch. The living area centers around an open fireplace, while large French windows provide the backdrop as the sun sets over Verbier.

This private vacation rental is set out over three floors and accommodates eight guests in four exquisite bedrooms. The first floor is home to three bedrooms. The master bedroom, with en-suite bathroom and separate toilet, is located at the front of the property. Also on this floor is a twin/double bedroom and a children’s bunk room, with handmade beds and skylight. The front two bedrooms also have access to the balcony.

Verbier stands out as a cosmopolitan and chic playground for celebrities and epicureans alike. This top tier skiing area boasts a fantastic track record of snowfall, great snow retention and a variety of slopes to accommodate all types of skiers, from beginners to the most experienced. Verbier also offers many options for hiking and biking. Ideal for a relaxing holiday with the entire family, a honeymoon or a wedding, the magic of the Swiss Alps awaits!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Terraces, great room, and bedrooms all command sea views at this contemporary Côte d’Azur villa. Built into the rock face above the Bay of Villefranche, this modern home balances natural scenery—rocks, pines, water—with sheets of windows and even a glass elevator. Drive 3.5 kilometers downhill to the colorful buildings and clear-water beaches in Villefranche-sur-Mer.

This villa is all about the views, whether you spot cruise ships from the infinity swimming pool on the rooftop, claim a spot on one of the plentiful chaise longues, or watch the sunset over dinner from the barbecue at the alfresco dining area.

And the panoramas don’t stop when you step indoors, thanks to nearly wall-to-wall windows overlooking both the harbor and the hillside. Clean-lined pieces like chrome armchairs, a hanging fireplace, and minimalist pendant lights add interest but not distraction in the living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen. Each of the 5 suite-style bedrooms is designed to offer sea views in a solarium-like setting.

This vacation rental is just above the town of Villefranche-sur-Mer, a Riviera classic that’s a favorite retreat for royalty and celebs, and a favorite filming location for Hollywood. Pack a picnic to eat on one of the town’s public beaches or ease into the rhythm of life in France and stop at a waterfront café for a drink. You’re also close enough to Nice and Monaco for a day trip along the coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This wonderfully refurbished home in one of London’s most fashionable districts, Knightsbridge, offers a sumptuous home away from home. Catering for a dozen guests, the home radiates charm and sophistication, complete with an elegant, brightly lit living room and an outdoor terrace. Complete with a refined study and exercise room, the proximity to central London and Hyde Park will appeal to many.

The modernized Elizabethan facade of this home is the first thing that will impact guests, harking back to the great history of the UK’s capital. Entering via a quiet side street, guests will instantly be struck by the light color themes, which amplify the sunlight shining in from the convenient terrace through ample windows. Outfitted to superb standards, the apartment ensures that guests can experience next-level convenience and comfort; from ornate, walk-in wardrobe room, through to the marble and dark wood utilized in the luxury bathroom. For guests who have a need to work or make calls, the private study’s pleasant outside view, crafted desk and pleasant office environment make for very useful resource.

The location of this home is an impressive one. Knightsbridge is one of the UK’s most desirable postcodes, and guests can simply walk or take a very short taxi ride to a huge range of shopping options, including the legendary Harrods. This district is jammed with the city’s most fashionable and lauded restaurants, providing a huge range of options for the gastronomically-minded, while the green expanses of Hyde Park are legendary for enjoyable rambles and bracing walks in the core of this international city. As evening falls, take in a stimulating West End play or slip into a chic Belgravia bar for a taste of London’s legendary nightlife. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Each stone, timber beam, and terracotta tile is something to behold at this lovingly restored Tuscan farmhouse near Casole d’Elsa. The villa sits on the grounds of the Casali di Casole estate, which has been farmed for thousands of years and was recently transformed into a country retreat. Today, you can hike or cycle past olive groves and vineyards to hilltop castles and tucked-away hamlets.

The latest chapter of the villa’s story features a sun-kissed terrace with plenty of seating and a heated infinity pool commanding views of the vineyards. Enjoy the comfort of the pergola-covered alfresco table, warmed by a traditional wood-burning oven, for dinner.

In times past, the house might have looked very different, but it feels much the same, thanks to well-preserved wood-beamed ceilings and stone walls. Brick archways separate the living area and dining area from a fully equipped kitchen, but the layout feels open in a decidedly modern way. There are 2 more sitting areas where you can bring a book and your glass of wine for a quiet moment.

Casali di Casole has plenty of hiking trails and mountain bikes to borrow, making it easy to explore this corner of Tuscany. Ask about joining a cooking class or even a truffle hunt on the estate, or get help booking a tee time at a nearby golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
